pages.title: Weaken
pages.text: Weaken is a runic power that imbues the wielder's weapon with the $(#87185d)$(l)essence of decay$(). $(br2)It grants the wielder a chance to slow and weaken their target with each successful strike.

Weaken is a powerful runic power that can give the wielder an edge in battle by slowing and weakening their target. $(br2)It's ideal for characters that are focused on close quarters combat, as it allows them to land more attacks and make the target's attacks less effective.
